      static class  RichMenu.MenuType 
      static class  RichMenu.RootContainer
      There are three menu root container values: NONE - we are not currently in a menu root container MENU_BAR - we are are currently rooted in a menuBar MENU_POPUP - we are currently rooted in a menu popup

    • Field Detail

      • AFR_MENU_DEPTH

        public static final String AFR_MENU_DEPTH
        Expando written for menu item depth level. Value 1 is not on a menu, and is used to indicate that menu items should be rendered either as bar items or not at all (that is the case for menu popup, where no menu item part of the menu is rendered). Value 2+ means on a menu, like a submenu or a menu item.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • increaseMenuDepth

        public static void increaseMenuDepth(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context)
        Increase the depth of the menu. This should be done in setup/tearDown encoding context to make sure it is called during ppr and ppr optimization.
        Parameters:
        context - The FacesContext

      • decreaseMenuDepth

        Parameters:

        the current depth of the menu

      • setMenuDepth

        public static void setMenuDepth(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context,
                                int newDepth)
        Sets the current depth of the menu. During initial rendering, you shouldn't be using this method but should instead use the increaseMenuDepth and decreaseMenuDepth methods. This method is needed to set menu depth during a ppr.
        Parameters:
        context - the FacesContext
        newDepth - the depth to set the menu

      • isRootContainerMenuBar

      • setRootContainer

        public static void setRootContainer(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context,
                                    RichMenu.RootContainer rootContainer)
        Set the current menu root container. This should be done in setup/tearDown encoding context to make sure it is called during ppr and ppr optimization.

        rootContainer - new root container
